features: ※4.3 inch classic game console※. supports multiple emulators, a game can be equivalent to many previous game consoles, users can play many types The game allows you to easily retrieve your childhood memories. It is very suitable for travel, indoor, outdoor, leisure use, and also suitable as a gift.

※Support game archive※. When playing the game, press the SELECT button to save the /Quit/Restart game progress. When you continue playing next time, you can load and save the progress without restarting. This is a very useful feature.

※Built-in thousands of classic games※. Built-in 2000 free classic games, including different simulator games, each simulator game has a corresponding folder. Users can find the games of these different emulators in the "Games" at the bottom left corner of the screen.

※Game can be added or deleted※. Non-solidified games can be added or deleted. Connect the game console to the computer, find the "GAME" in the game console on the computer, you can add or delete games here; you can create a new file here, put your favorite games in it, so you can Find the game you want to play quickly.
※Support connecting to TV to play games※. The game console is connected to the TV through the AV cable, and the user can play games/watch videos on the TV,Share happiness with your family/friends!;

※More other entertainment functions※.It's not just a game console. When you don't want to play games, it can also watch movies, electronic music and e-books. It also has recording, e-book, stopwatch, calendar and other functions.
※Built-in rechargeable lithium battery※.supports USB charging, long battery life, energy-saving, environmentally friendly, and convenient.
body.description: Support connecting to TV to play games Support connecting to TV to play games. The game console is connected to the TV through the AV cable, and the user can play games/watch videos on the TV，Share happiness with your family/friends! How to connect the TV? The game console can be connected to the TV through an AV cable, select the corresponding signal source on the TV, then select on the game console screen and press the A key to enter "Setting" ---"TV-OUT", select "PAL" or "NTSC" (according to the TV system of the user's country).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4.3 inch classic multi-function game console 4.3 inch classic game console, supports multiple emulators, a game can be equivalent to many previous game consoles, users can play many types .The game allows you to easily retrieve your childhood memories.It can also watch movies, electronic music and e-books.It is very suitable for travel, indoor, outdoor, leisure use, and also suitable as a gift.

Support games to save progress Support game archive.When you play the game, what should the user do if there is a situation such as low power/something to leave/the game is too difficult to pass/ etc?you can press the "SELECT" button to Save /Exit/Restart game progress. When you continue playing next time, You can load the saved progress to start the game without restarting. This is a very useful feature.

Built-in thousands of classic games Built-in 2000 free classic games, including different simulator games, each simulator(GBA/GBC/GB/FC/SFC/MD/SEGA) game has a corresponding folder. Users can find the games of these different emulators in the "Games" at the bottom left corner of the screen. How to quickly find the game you want to play? Connect the game console to the computer, find the "GAME" folder of the game console on the computer, the user can create another folder in the "GAME" folder, such as"my favorite",, and then copy the game files you like to this folder folder. The next time you can find the game you want to play directly in this folder.

The game can be added or deleted The game can be added or deleted. Non-solidified games can be added or deleted. Connect the game console to the computer, find the "GAME" in the game console on the computer, you can add or delete games here; you can create a new file here, put your favorite games in it, so you can Find the game you want to play quickly. How to download more games? What formats of games can be added? This game console cannot be connected to the Internet. Users can surf the Internet on the computer, search and download games on Google or other websites. Currently, only add the suffix name is .gba/.gbc/.gb/.nes/.sfc/.bin/ .smd game files, the game files must be copied to the ''GAME' folder in the console. If some games cannot be opened, the file information may be missing, you can delete it and download it again.

Built-in rechargeable lithium battery The built-in rechargeable lithium battery supports USB charging, which is very convenient and energy-saving. Support connecting to TV to play games Support connecting to TV to play games. The game console is connected to the TV through the AV cable, and the user can play games/watch videos on the TV，Share happiness with your family/friends! How to connect the TV? The game console can be connected to the TV through an AV cable, select the corresponding signal source on the TV, then select on the game console screen and press the A key to enter "Setting" ---"TV-OUT", select "PAL" or "NTSC" (according to the TV system of the user's country).

It's not just a game console It's not just a game console. When you don't want to play games, it can also watch movies, electronic music and e-books. It also has recording, e-book, stopwatch, calendar and other functions.;Maximum support 64GB TF card expansion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Price should only be around $20 tops
reviews.reviewText: Get ready for an honest rant. ;)I bought this for mainly classic rpg and fighting games. The fighting games played but the controls were sticky and unusable. Not to mention LOUD!!! I got complaints whenever I was using it that the button clicking was too obnoxious. They are so loud that I couldn’t hear the game sounds clearly unless I wore earbuds. The dpad buttons kept sticking and made action games unplayable. And the joystick isn’t accurate. It too kept sticking in one of the four directions and wouldn’t unstick for some time after releasing.Quite a few of the rpg games I got this for didn’t work. Said they couldn’t be loaded. They played on every other system I have so I know the files are good. I loaded via the usb several times and with different file versions and still didn’t play. The firmware used outdated and buggy bios. Glitchy graphics and bad interface. Names of games aren’t clear so it is like gambling to see what game I was going to get. Some games were smooth after load while others kept flickering.Screen and sound were decent. Not good but decent. Screen cover was plastic (the actual screen, not the protector that came with it) and images were not crisp. The edges had a black line around that cut off some of the playable area. This is important if you want to track scores or health.Battery lasted for a few hours with new games and only about an hour or two with arcade games. Not too bad except the low power warning doesn’t always show and unit will shut off unexpectedly when power gets low. The power on led was very bright and distracting. It doesn’t turn off after some time playing.Bottom line: don’t waste frustration or money on this. Save up for a better system. One that has better software, controls, and screen. I wouldn’t mind if this was only half the price but it turned out to be far more expensive than what I received. I had more fun gambling on which games loaded than actually trying to play the games with the awful, clackity controls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Many games but quality quite low
reviews.reviewText: There are many good gamesBut video and sound quality is too lowAlso yhe buttons doesnt always respond

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, you can't beat it with a hooker! I MEAN STICK! CANT BEAT IT WITH A STICK!
reviews.reviewText: I must say, after reading some reviews I was nervous. It seems to be hit or miss when it comes to this, but I have absolutely no complaints and couldn't be happier.Controls are fine. Screen looks great. No Lagging. There are some decent games that come on it, but being able to delete and add games at my neck and call is what pushes this into the awesome realm.I've always played roms onna computer. Using the keyboard as a makeshift joy stick, but now I have an actual d pad with real buttons and it's a game changer.FF6, golden sun 1 and 2, the shining force series, phantasy star series, land stalker, castlevania's, megaman, mario games, mega bomber man for snes, pirates gold! Seriously, this will get it use and then some.So, as a happy buyer, knowing that other people out there weren't nearly as satisfied... Im not sure what to say. It's great for me! And I'd recommend. But always read all the comments and make sure you're not breaking the bank with this.:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's definitely worth the $40 price
reviews.reviewText: It says there are no repeat games but there are plenty of repeat games on here. You have Sonic, you got Pac-Man, Miss Pac-Man, mortal Kombat, Street fighter, x-men, Spider-Man ,Ghostbusters 2, teenage mutant Ninja turtles, super Mario Brothers, a whole bunch of super Mario Brothers, 4 mortal Kombats. Some of the games don't work the bottom arrow key sometimes stays down and you have to touch it to pick it back up. I have saved games but I'm not able to find the games I've saved guess I have to do some more reading in the manual. When I received the console battery was already charged I have no idea how long the battery lasts. I think that the game console is well worth the price but the small round arrow joystick thing is useless. It does not come with a v cable to attach the TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Excelente los juegos están muy lindo divertidoEs fácil de usar me gusta que ya tenga los juegos agregados

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn't give this to my 5 year old.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is god awful. The home screen can not be changed or customized in any way. The games/icons, for better or for worse, are there permanently. A ton of games are repeats just in different languages and some are just flatout repeats. A ton of them just don't work and the ones that do run at unplayable frame rates and stuttering sounds.I found some videos/information online and they all pretty much confirmed the above. I wanted this for my son but I'm not fond of torturing my own kids. Yeah, for 30 bucks, you get what you pay for, but really they just shouldn't sell it period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do Not buy Defective Battery in the gaming console
reviews.reviewText: The battery life of this game is short. You only get 45 minutes of gameplay on a full charge. I purchased three consoles, two of which took more than 24 hours to completely charge. One console stopped charging all together. I contacted the seller to make them aware of the defective games and they only offered to send one replacement game. Additionally, Amazon would not send a QR code to make the return process easier. I ended up having to pay for UPS to pick up the items. Worst experience ever!
